means: （尤指某种科学）应用的，实用的
应用( apply的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They had entered the country and had applied for permanent residence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经入境该国，并申请了永久居留权。

sentence.Network_en: The law could arrest the development of good research if applied prematurely.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果草率施行，该法律将会阻滞高质量研究的进展。

sentence.Network_en: He applied for asylum in 1987 after fleeing the police back home.
sentence.Network_cn: 1987年他在本国逃脱警察追捕后，就申请了政治庇护。

entry.def: An applied subject of study has a practical use, rather than being concerned only with theory.

example.ex: ...plans to put more money into applied research.
example.tran: 将更多资金投入应用研究的计划

sentences.sentence: "an isotropic resonance shift...to lower applied fields"

means.word_mean: 2. concerned with concrete problems or data rather than with fundamental principles; opposed to theoretical;

sentences.sentence: "technical problems in medicine, engineering, economics and other applied disciplines"- Sidney Hook

means.word_mean: 3. put into practice or put to use;

auth_sentence.content: Often the chemical is applied to seeds before planting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Often the chemical is applied to seeds before planting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Often the chemical is applied to seeds before planting.

auth_sentence.content: She applied at a machine shop in central Pennsylvania.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: She applied at a machine shop in central Pennsylvania.

auth_sentence.content: It will then be sequentially applied to other models.
auth_sentence.res_content: It will then be sequentially applied to other models.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It will then be sequentially applied to other models.

Sentence.sentence: In contrast," the researchers continue, "many regulations that don't assume people make rational choices have been successfully applied to control alcohol, a substance — like food — of which immoderate consumption leads to serious health problems.

The research references studies of people's behavior with food and alcohol and results of alcohol restrictions, and then lists five regulations that the researchers think might be promising if applied to junk foods

The technology has been successfully applied overseas, but the only other public robotic garage in the United States has been troublesome, dropping vehicles and trapping cars because of technical problems.
In a paper published recently, Kapur applied the principle of productive failure to mathematical problem solving in three schools.
It will be applied in any field imaginable.

means.word_mean: (尤指某种科学)应用的；实用的

sentences.en: I’m going to take a course in applied mathematics this semester.
sentences.cn: 我这学期打算学习应用数学课程。

sentences.en: She plans to take a course in applied linguistics.
sentences.cn: 她打算学习应用语言学课程。
